aws_vpn_connection.description: Manages an EC2 VPN connection. These objects can be connected to customer gateways, and allow you to establish tunnels between your network and Amazon.

customer_gateway_id.description: The ID of the customer gateway.

type.description: The type of VPN connection. The only type AWS supports at this time is "ipsec.1".

transit_gateway_id.description: The ID of the EC2 Transit Gateway.

vpn_gateway_id.description: The ID of the Virtual Private Gateway.

static_routes_only.description: Whether the VPN connection uses static routes exclusively. Static routes must be used for devices that don't support BGP.

tags.description: Tags to apply to the connection.

tunnel1_inside_cidr.description: The CIDR block of the inside IP addresses for the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_inside_cidr.description: The CIDR block of the inside IP addresses for the second VPN tunnel.

tunnel1_preshared_key.description: The preshared key of the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_preshared_key.description: The preshared key of the second VPN tunnel.

id.description: The amazon-assigned ID of the VPN connection.

customer_gateway_configuration.description: The configuration information for the VPN connection's customer gateway (in the native XML format).

customer_gateway_id.description: The ID of the customer gateway to which the connection is attached.

static_routes_only.description: Whether the VPN connection uses static routes exclusively.

transit_gateway_attachment_id.description: When associated with an EC2 Transit Gateway (`transit_gateway_id` argument), the attachment ID.

tunnel1_address.description: The public IP address of the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel1_cgw_inside_address.description: The RFC 6890 link-local address of the first VPN tunnel (Customer Gateway Side).

tunnel1_vgw_inside_address.description: The RFC 6890 link-local address of the first VPN tunnel (VPN Gateway Side).

tunnel1_preshared_key.description: The preshared key of the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel1_bgp_asn.description: The bgp asn number of the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel1_bgp_holdtime.description: The bgp holdtime of the first VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_address.description: The public IP address of the second VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_cgw_inside_address.description: The RFC 6890 link-local address of the second VPN tunnel (Customer Gateway Side).

tunnel2_vgw_inside_address.description: The RFC 6890 link-local address of the second VPN tunnel (VPN Gateway Side).

tunnel2_preshared_key.description: The preshared key of the second VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_bgp_asn.description: The bgp asn number of the second VPN tunnel.

tunnel2_bgp_holdtime.description: The bgp holdtime of the second VPN tunnel.

vpn_gateway_id.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway to which the connection is attached.
